attributes.value: Sees friendship as one of the finer things in life
Has a negative view of those who exercise power over others
Finds the idea of fair-dealing foolish and cheats when she finds it profitable
Sees introspection as important
Has a great deal of respect for worthy craftsmanship
Finds the pursuit of skill mastery off-putting
Sees competition as wasteful and silly
Sees perseverance in the face of adversity as bull-headed and foolish
Values leisure time
Finds nature somewhat disturbing
Very rarely develops negative feelings toward things
Often feels envious of others
Is brave in the face of imminent danger
Tends to hang on to grievances
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Is quite comfortable with others that have a different appearance or culture
Dislikes helping others
Tries to keep her things orderly
Only rarely tries to assert herself in conversation
Agile
Tough
Susceptible to disease
A very good sense of the position of her own body
